title: This Soothing Breakfast Recipe Is Stress-Relief in a Bowl
sub_head: Brightened with fresh chiles and ginger, the savory semolina porridge known as upma, typically served for breakfast in southern and western India, makes a quick, soothing meal at any time of day.
body: A SIMPLE, SOOTHING semolina porridge warmed up with fresh chiles, ginger, mustard seeds and curry leaves, upma has comforted chef Chintan Pandya since childhood.
